alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 10:18PM CDT until September 23 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bourbon County in southeastern Kansas... Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Western Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Vernon County in west central Missouri... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1018 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Arma, or 8 miles north of Girard, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsburg, Prairie State Park, Frontenac, Girard, Arma, Liberal, Mulberry, Nashville, Mindenmines, Franklin, Arcadia, Bronaugh, Walnut, Hepler, Burgess, Beulah, Croweburg, Yale, Farlington and Brazilton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
